dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1791 IH: Increasing Credit Union Lending for Business Growth Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Vicente Gonzalez of Texas (for himself and Mr. Fitzpatrick) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Credit Union Act to provide more loan flexibility to credit unions, to amend the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to expand homeownership access, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Increasing Credit Union Lending for Business Growth Act.
Section 107A(c)(1)(B)(iii) of the Federal Credit Union Act (12 U.S.C. 1757a(c)(1)(B)(iii)) is amended by striking $50,000 and inserting $100,000.
